value.mermaid:
erDiagram
    users {
        uuid id PK
        text employee_id
        text name
        text department
        text position
        text email
        date hire_date
        jsonb profile_data
    }
    skills {
        uuid id PK
        text name
        text category
    }
    user_skills {
        uuid id PK
        uuid user_id FK
        uuid skill_id FK
        integer level
        numeric years_of_experience
    }
    challenges {
        uuid id PK
        text title
        text description
        uuid posted_by FK
        text status
        jsonb required_skills
    }
    ideas {
        uuid id PK
        text title
        text description
        uuid posted_by FK
        jsonb required_resources
    }
    matches {
        uuid id PK
        uuid user_id FK
        text target_type
        uuid target_id
        numeric match_score
    }
    messages {
        uuid id PK
        uuid sender_id FK
        uuid receiver_id FK
        text content
        timestamp sent_at
        timestamp read_at
    }
    users ||--o{ user_skills : has
    skills ||--o{ user_skills : assigned_to
    users ||--o{ challenges : posts
    users ||--o{ ideas : creates
    users ||--o{ matches : matched_with
    users ||--o{ messages : sends
    users ||--o{ messages : receives
